title: Anatomy of an Akira Ransomware Attack: When a Fake CAPTCHA Led to 42 Days of Compromise

content.raw: Unit 42 outlines a Howling Scorpius attack delivering Akira ransomware that originated from a fake CAPTCHA and led to a 42-day compromise. The post Anatomy of an Akira Ransomware Attack: When a Fake CAPTCHA Led to 42 Days of Compromise appeared first on Unit 42.
